		                    Stage III Testicular Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage III testicular cancer depends on whether the cancer is a seminoma or a nonseminoma.    Treatment of seminoma may include the following:         -  Surgery to remove the testicle, followed by combination chemotherapy. If there are tumors remaining after chemotherapy, treatment may be one of the following:               -  Surveillance with no
